## EventListener

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/handlers/AppEventsHandler.ts" sourceLine="14" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents an event listener with its configuration.

```ts title="Signature"
type EventListener = {
    handler: ListenerFunction;
    once: boolean;
}
```
